docs.title: User login
docs.text:
• Login using any of the provided options.
  • Select age and gender.

docs.title: Home screen.
docs.text: • The home screen is a dashboard that includes information about the current user their credit balance and various services offered by the app.

docs.title: Credits
docs.text:
• Credits are the in-app currency for IVVY.
  • Credits can be used to book appointments and consult with psychiatrists.

docs.title: Adding credits
docs.text:
• User can add credits by tapping the coin icon at the top right of the home screen.
  • Users will be taken to the credits shop screen where they can purchase credits using the payment method of their choice.

docs.title: Services
docs.text:
• Available services can be found on the home screen. Users can access them by tapping on the desired icon.

  • Users can search for a desired service using the search icon.

docs.title: Consult a Psychiatrist
docs.text:
• On the home screen click on the Live Chat icon.
  • The user can view a list of available Psychiatrists on the next screen.
  • Upon clicking the chat icon the user will be able to chat with the Psychiatrist.
  • Click the top right call icon to request an appointment.
  • Select between a video appointment or a call appointment.
  • An appointment request will be sent to the Psychiatrist.

docs.title: Register as a psychiatrist
docs.text:
• On the home screen click on the three dots on top right.

  • Then select My Account as shown above.

  • Click on Register as a Psychiatrist at the bottom.

  • Fill up the required information and click submit.
